# Reporting analyses

- [How to report analysis results](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s43440-020-00110-5): A published guide on the approproate way to report results from a statistical test.

- [Reporting statistical methods](https://esajournals.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1002/ecs2.4539): A great paper on the necessary level of detail in methods reporting, a how-to-guide

# Reproducible Science

- [Guides to reproducible code](https://www.britishecologicalsociety.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/BES-Guide-Reproducible-Code-2019.pdf?utm_source=web&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=better_science): The British Ecological Society guide to making reproducible code

- [Society for Open, Reliable, and Transparent Ecology and Evolutionary biology ](https://www.sortee.org/reading/): This organisation produces a reading list on how to make better reproducible science
